title.rendered: Student Ambassador Best Practices with University of San Diego

content.rendered:
At the University of San Diego, we have built a robust Handshake training for our student ambassadors. In this presentation, we aim to share specific examples and best practices for other Handshake Schools seeking to involve their student ambassadors in the platform. These best practices include: setting permissions, scheduling appointments, labeling contacts, approving employers and jobs, and analyzing data. Beyond sharing best practices, we want to convey how Handshake has empowered our student ambassadors with a meaningful experience.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Learn specific examples and best practices for involving student ambassadors in the Handshake platform
